reviewText:
R.D. Crowley (Robert Davi) runs a cyber prison system where his high paying clients can cyber fight against the prisoners.  Will (J. Gregory Smith) is a history buff and cyber prison guard who gets coerced into siding with a group of prisoners who fight against said clients. They are placed in historical settings where they are on the losing side. Only will's knowledge of history can change the outcome.

The movie sounds better than what it is. The characters are shallow. The scenes are numerous and not well developed.

Guide: F-bomb, sex, nudity (Amy Lynn Baxter-Penthouse magazine's Pet of the Month for June 1990) rape.
